name: Cox's Bazar seeview
description: The resort is all inclusive! The visitors can spend fun time on the private beach of the resort. The resort has the longest poolside comprising of 2 swimming pools out of which one is exclusively for the ladies. One can also workout in well-equipped gymnasium or try a hand at tennis, badminton and billiards. The kids as well as adults are surely going to love the water park which is internationally acclaimed.
